ps3.2:9.20: Ekattagataṃ → ekaggataṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), nānattakilesehi → nānattakilese (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ps3.2:18.20: rūpiṃ → rūpaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr), sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ → sabbaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
ps3.2:19.7: indavaṇṇaṃ vā →  asuravaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, indavaṇṇaṃ vā (sī1, sya-all)
ps3.2:30.2: cakkavattī → cakkavatti (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), assabandhagopurise → assabandhagobandhapurise (bj) | assabandhagopake purise (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
